Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1976...
Traded from Plum Grove to Northeastern on 6/6/1976 (Going to NE: 2B L. Dickens, P J. Turner, P R. Ramirez. Going to PG: LF T. Lary)...
Injured on 5/14/1981 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/13/1983...
Had first career hit on 8/16/1983, off Terry Frost Jr. (Mal)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/29/1983, off Lyndon Williamson (NJ)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/7/1988 to a 5-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
